meanings.definition: The quality or state of being beautiful.
meanings.sent1: The beautifulnesses of the sunset took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beautifulnesses of the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The beautifulnesses of the cake made it too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile radiated a beautifulnesses that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the beautifulnesses of nature in the painting.

meanings.definition: The combination of qualities that pleases the aesthetic senses.
meanings.sent1: The beautifulnesses of the melody brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The garden was a perfect example of natural beautifulnesses.
meanings.sent3: The beautifulnesses of the outfit made heads turn at the party.
meanings.sent4: The beautifulnesses of the landscape was like a dream come true.
meanings.sent5: She was mesmerized by the beautifulnesses of the ballet performance.
